enum DEFAULT_DEBUG_DIR

Function Documentation

phpCAS::setDebug ( $  filename = ''  )  [inherited]

Set/unset debug mode

Parameters:
$filename the name of the file used for logging, or FALSE to stop debugging.
Examples:
example_db.php, example_file.php, example_gateway.php, example_proxy.php, example_proxy2.php, example_service.php, example_session_proxy.php, example_session_service.php, and example_simple.php.
